mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.pic, u.created_at, u.uid, u.nick_name, COUNT(DISTINCT f.feed_id) AS feed_count, COUNT(DISTINCT fl.feed_id, fl.user_id) AS all_feed_like_count, COUNT(DISTINCT uf_er.from_user_id) AS follower_count, COUNT(DISTINCT uf_ing.to_user_id) AS following_count, MAX(IF(uf_er.from_user_id = #{signedUserId}, 1, 0)) + MAX(IF(uf_ing.to_user_id = #{signedUserId}, 2, 0)) AS follow_state FROM user u JOIN feed f ON f.write_user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN feed_like fl ON fl.feed_id = f.feed_id JOIN user_follow uf_er ON uf_er.to_user_id = u.user_id JOIN user_follow uf_ing ON uf_ing.from_user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{profileUserId};
